thread.title: Shamrock Jewelers ordered padlocked by bankruptcy judge
thread.title_full: Shamrock Jewelers ordered padlocked by bankruptcy judge | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Jane Musgrave
title: Shamrock Jewelers ordered padlocked by bankruptcy judge
text:
Having worked in the jewelry business since he was 16 years old, Anthony Simpson says he knows all too well the dangers faced by those who cart tens of thousands of dollars of gold, diamonds and other precious gems from store to store.
Hoping to provide security for jewelers and those who carry large amounts of cash or other valuables, the longtime owner of Shamrock Jewelers in Lake Park invented a high-tech suitcase that can only be opened by certain people in certain places and can be tracked if it falls into the wrong hands.
